properties.value:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: gocd-agent-{{ POD_POSTFIX }}
  labels:
    app: web
spec:
  serviceAccountName: gocd-app
  containers:
    - name: gocd-agent-container-{{ CONTAINER_POSTFIX }}
      image: gocd/gocd-agent-alpine-3.9:v19.4.0
      securityContext:
      resources:
        limits:
          memory: 768Mi
        requests:
          memory: 256Mi
